description: Enterprise techniques used by CALENDAR, ATT&CK software S0025 v1.2
name: CALENDAR (S0025)

techniques.comment: [CALENDAR](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0025) has a command to run cmd.exe to execute commands.(Citation: Mandiant APT1 Appendix)
The [CALENDAR](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0025) malware communicates through the use of events in Google Calendar.(Citation: Mandiant APT1)(Citation: Mandiant APT1 Appendix)
